name: Urania's Cloak
description:
🌈 Made for Rainbow Game Jam 2020 🌈

Play the role of a teenage trans girl, exploring her love of astronomy and reflecting on her life on the edge of reality.

The game will take 30-45 minutes to complete for the first time. It also supports fullscreen, windowed and borderless windowed modes, and uses only royalty-free music, so it's streamer friendly.

⚠️ Content warning ⚠️

The storyline of this game deals with suicide. If you wish, you can still play the game without the story elements.

✨ Credits ✨

Fonts
Sniglet by Haley Fiege
Josefin Sans by Santiago Orozco

Moon and Sky Textures
Solar System Scope

Music
Recalling by Blear Moon
Tão Perto, Tão Longe... by Himalayha
Homeroad by Kai Engel
Ethereal and Rise by Punch Deck

Sounds
3maze · Airborne Sound · Chris Logsdon
Sound Ideas · Soundrangers · SoundsArchaic

❤️ Follow the developer on Twitter! ❤️
